::Shadow Wing::

She nodded and flew off to the base with her crow in her talons.

As she was flying, she spotted Lunarpine in the trees.  She swooped 
down to him.  She called out, "Hello there. I just wanted to say 
thanks again."  She droped the crow in front of him and landed.
She could see that his optics were not healed.  They looked blank. 
She felt sorry for him.  She also felt partailly responcable for his 
injury. She knew he was a proud wolf and wouldn't want her to feel 
sorry for him, but she did.  She just had to hide her feelings for 
now and just try to help him without offending him.
I got a call over the link.  The base is in trouble.  If you want to 
scarf the dinner I brought, I'll wait and we can go back together.  
I'll keep a birds eye view out for trouble along the way."
She tried to sound reasuring, but regretted the words 'birds eye 
view'. Bad joice of words, she thought.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Prowl spins around as Shadow Wing lands near him. He looks calmly 
as her, 
> nodding. "I might be a bit insane, yes. Me and Dinobot are going to 
rescue 
> Iron Raptor and Tavatron. You go to the base and help defend it."
> 
> He frowns as he recieves Hot Rod's transmission. "No can do for 
now. Me and 
> Dinobot will be back to finish off the preds later, WITH Iron 
Raptor and 
> Tavatron. Untill then, I'm shutting off my comm."
> 
> He switches off that frequency, leaving his comm only open to 
Dinobot.
